trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The skavenslave has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the skavenslave's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated} .

trait.name: Scurry Away!
entries: Skaven can quickly scamper away from danger. When skaven takes disengage or dash action, its base speed increases by 10 feet.

trait.name: Cowardly Wretches
entries: Skavenslaves have disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws against being {@condition frightened} if they are outnumbered and no clanrat masters are within sight.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The skavenslave has advantage on Wisdom (perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Sling
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The clanrat has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the skavenslave's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated} .

trait.name: Scurry Away!
entries: Skaven can quickly scamper away from danger. When skaven takes disengage or dash action, its base speed increases by 10 feet.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The clanrat has advantage on Wisdom (perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Crossbow, light
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the stormvermin can deal an extra 7 ({@damage 3d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the stormvermin that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The stormvermin has advantage on Wisdom (perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Scurry Away!
entries: Skaven can quickly scamper away from danger. When skaven takes disengage or dash action, its base speed increases by 10 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The stormvermin makes two weapon attacks with its glaive or longsword

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage if used with both hands.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Menace below (1/Long Rest)
entries: The stormvermin rings a handbell calling out for aid, audible up to 100ft. This summons {@dice 2d4} Skavenslaves to enter the battle clawing their way out of he ground or coming out of windows and doors at the end of its next turn rolling for their initiative. This feature can only be used by one stormvermin per encounter.

trait.name: Scurry Away!
entries: Skaven can quickly scamper away from danger. When skaven takes disengage or dash action, its base speed increases by 10 feet.

trait.name: Persistent Pestilence
entries: If damage reduces the plague monk to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is from a critical hit. On a success, the plague monk drops to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The plague monk has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the plague monk's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated} .

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the plague monk must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the plague monk's stench for 1 hour.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The plague monk has advantage on Wisdom (perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The plague monk makes three shortsword attacks one of which can be replaced with bite attack.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or contract a disease. Until the disease is cured, the target can.t regain hit points except by magical means, and the target's hit points maximum decreases by {@dice d6} every 24 hours. If the target's hit point maximum drops to 0 as a result of this disease, the target dies.

trait.name: Scurry Away!
entries: Skaven can quickly scamper away from danger. When skaven takes disengage or dash action, its base speed increases by 10 feet.

trait.name: Pounce and Pin
entries: If the night runner moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone} he is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the gutter runner can't attack another target.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The night runner has advantage on Wisdom (perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The night runner makes two rat claws attacks.

action.name: Rat Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage. The target must make a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw, taking 11 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Smoke Bomb
entries: The night runner throws a smoke bomb at a hard surface within 30 feet, creating a short lived thick smoke in a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on that point. The sphere spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured. It lasts until end of gutter runner's turn.

trait.name: Swarm Tactics
entries: While the skavenslave swarm is above half health it has advantage on melee attack rolls.

trait.name: Scurry Away!
entries: Skaven can quickly scamper away from danger. When skaven takes disengage or dash action, its base speed increases by 10 feet.

trait.name: Cowardly Wretches
entries: Skavenslaves have disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws against being {@condition frightened} if they are outnumbered and no clanrat masters are within sight.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The skavenslave swarm has advantage on Wisdom (perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The skavenslave swarm (small) can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a small skaven. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Skavenslave swarm makes one attack against up to three creatures within reach.

action.name: Teeth, claws and steel
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage or {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6}) slashing damage if the swarm is below half health.

trait.name: Swarm Tactics
entries: While the skavenslave swarm is above half health it has advantage on melee attack rolls.

trait.name: Scurry Away!
entries: Skaven can quickly scamper away from danger. When skaven takes disengage or dash action, its base speed increases by 10 feet.

trait.name: Cowardly Wretches
entries: Skavenslaves have disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws against being {@condition frightened} if they are outnumbered and no clanrat masters are within sight.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The skavenslave swarm has advantage on Wisdom (perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The skavenslave swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a small skaven. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: Stampede
entries: When a skavenslave swarm moves through a space of another creature or that creature ends its turn inside the space of a swarm, it needs to succeed {@dc 15} Strength save or be knocked {@condition prone} and take {@damage 2d6} bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Skavenslave swarm makes one attack against for any hostile creature within reach.

action.name: Teeth, claws and steel
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 4d6}) slashing damage or {@h}4 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage if the swarm is below half health.

trait.name: Swarm Tactics
entries: While the skavenslave swarm is above half health it has advantage on melee attack rolls.

trait.name: Scurry Away!
entries: Skaven can quickly scamper away from danger. When skaven takes disengage or dash action, its base speed increases by 10 feet.

trait.name: Cowardly Wretches
entries: Skavenslaves have disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws against being {@condition frightened} if they are outnumbered and no clanrat masters are within sight.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The skavenslave swarm has advantage on Wisdom (perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The skavenslave swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a small skaven. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: Stampede
entries: When a skavenslave swarm moves through a space of another creature or that creature ends its turn inside the space of a swarm, it needs to succeed {@dc 16} Strength save or be knocked {@condition prone} and take {@damage 4d6} bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Skavenslave swarm makes one attack for any hostile creature within reach.

action.name: Teeth, claws and steel
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 6d6}) slashing damage or {@h}11 ({@damage 3d6}) slashing damage if the swarm is below half health.

monster.name: Rat Ogre
languages: understands Queekish but can't speak it.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The rat ogre has advantage on Wisdom (perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Berserk
entries: Whenever the rat ogre starts its turn with 40 hit points or fewer, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 5-6, the rat ogre goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the rat ogre attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the rat ogre attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the rat ogre goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points. It can use Bite attack as a bonus action while berserk.

The rat ogre's packmaster, if within 60 feet of the berserk rat ogre, can try to subdue it through whistles, yells and whip cracks. The rat ogre must be able to hear its packmaster, who must take an action to make a {@dc 15} Charisma (Intimidation) check. If the check succeeds, the rat ogre ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 60 hit points or fewer, the rat ogre might go berserk again.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the rat ogre can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Rat ogre makes two fist attacks or one fist and one bit attack.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Scurry Away!
entries: Skaven can quickly scamper away from danger. When skaven takes disengage or dash action, its base speed increases by 10 feet.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The packmaster has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the packmaster's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated} .

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The packmaster has advantage on Wisdom (perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Grappler
entries: The packmaster has advantage on Charisma (Intimidation) checks against any creature {@condition grappled} by it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The packmaster makes two attacks: one with it’s whip and one with it’s shortsword.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) slashing damage.If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the packmaster can’t use his whip on another target. If this attack is a critical hit, the target also can’t breathe or speak until the grapple ends.
